languages.text: {n}От Комиссара исходят почти осязаемые волны решимости.{/n} "Победа, соратники! Спасение совсем близко! По другую сторону этой пространственной червоточины нас ждут, так что не будем терять времени!" {n}В руке офицера зажат странный ксеноприбор. Комиссар направляет его на пространственный разрыв, жмет пару кнопок — и бушующие энтропические энергии успокаиваются, формируя стабильный портал.{/n}

{n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}От Комиссара исходят почти осязаемые волны решимости.{/n} "Победа, соратники! Спасение совсем близко! По другую сторону этой пространственной червоточины нас ждут, так что не будем терять времени!" {n}В руке офицера зажат странный ксеноприбор. Комиссар направляет его на пространственный разрыв, жмет пару кнопок — и бушующие энтропические энергии успокаиваются, формируя стабильный портал.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, my comrades-in-arms! Salvation is near! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this spatial rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}
"Victory, my comrades-in-arms! Salvation is near! Our allies await us on the other side of this spatial rift, so let us not waste time!"

{n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, my comrades-in-arms! Salvation is near! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this spatial rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

{n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, my comrades-in-arms! Salvation is near! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this spatial rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

{n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}政委带着不容置疑的决心吼道。{/n}“为了胜利，同志们！责任在召唤！我们的盟友在这个古怪裂隙的另一边等着，所以不要再浪费时间了！”{n}政委手中拿着一个古怪的异形装置，把它对准裂隙，按下了几个按钮。咆哮的熵能逐渐消散，一个稳定的传送门出现了在虚空之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委带着不容置疑的决心吼道。{/n}“为了胜利，同志们！责任在召唤！我们的盟友在这个古怪裂隙的另一边等着，所以不要再浪费时间了！”{n}政委手中拿着一个古怪的异形装置，把它对准裂隙，按下了几个按钮。咆哮的熵能逐渐消散，一个稳定的传送门出现了在虚空之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}コミッサーの熱い決意がひしひしと伝わってきた。{/n}「同胞よ、我々の勝利だ！任務にあたれ！仲間たちがこの奇妙な亀裂の向こう側で待っている。ただちに進むぞ！」{n}彼は風変りな異種族製の装置を持っている。コミッサーが装置を亀裂に向けてボタンを何度か押すと、こんこんと流れるエントロピー・エネルギーが静まり、安定したポータルが現れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーの熱い決意がひしひしと伝わってきた。{/n}「同胞よ、我々の勝利だ！任務にあたれ！仲間たちがこの奇妙な亀裂の向こう側で待っている。ただちに進むぞ！」{n}彼は風変りな異種族製の装置を持っている。コミッサーが装置を亀裂に向けてボタンを何度か押すと、こんこんと流れるエントロピー・エネルギーが静まり、安定したポータルが現れる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La resolución del Comisario es palpable.{/n} «¡Victoria, camaradas! ¡El deber nos llama! ¡Nuestros aliados nos esperan al otro lado de esta extraña fisura, de modo que no tenemos tiempo que perder!». {n}Sostiene un xenodispositivo desconocido. El Comisario apunta a la fisura con él, pulsa unos botones y las turbulentas energías entrópicas se calman para formar un portal estable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La resolución del Comisario es palpable.{/n} «¡Victoria, camaradas! ¡El deber nos llama! ¡Nuestros aliados nos esperan al otro lado de esta extraña fisura, de modo que no tenemos tiempo que perder!». {n}Sostiene un xenodispositivo desconocido. El Comisario apunta a la fisura con él, pulsa unos botones y las turbulentas energías entrópicas se calman para formar un portal estable.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire respire la détermination.{/n} « Victoire, camarades ! Le devoir nous appelle ! Nos alliés nous attendent de l'autre côté de cette étrange faille, nous devons les rejoindre sans plus tarder ! » {n}Le commissaire pointe un étrange appareil xénos vers la faille avant d'appuyer sur plusieurs boutons. Soudain, les énergies entropiques se stabilisent pour former un portail.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire respire la détermination.{/n} « Victoire, camarades ! Le devoir nous appelle ! Nos alliés nous attendent de l'autre côté de cette étrange faille, nous devons les rejoindre sans plus tarder ! » {n}Le commissaire pointe un étrange appareil xénos vers la faille avant d'appuyer sur plusieurs boutons. Soudain, les énergies entropiques se stabilisent pour former un portail.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Reaktion des Kommissars ist eindeutig.{/n} "Sieg, Kameraden! Die Pflicht ruft! Unsere Verbündeten warten auf der anderen Seite dieses seltsamen Risses, also lasst uns keine Zeit vergeuden!" {n}In der Hand hält er ein merkwürdiges Xenogerät. Der Kommissar zielt damit auf den Riss und drückt einige Tasten. Die brodelnden entropischen Energien lassen nach und bilden ein stabiles Portal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Reaktion des Kommissars ist eindeutig.{/n} "Sieg, Kameraden! Die Pflicht ruft! Unsere Verbündeten warten auf der anderen Seite dieses seltsamen Risses, also lasst uns keine Zeit vergeuden!" {n}In der Hand hält er ein merkwürdiges Xenogerät. Der Kommissar zielt damit auf den Riss und drückt einige Tasten. Die brodelnden entropischen Energien lassen nach und bilden ein stabiles Portal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Komiser'in kararlılığı hissediliyor.{/n} "Yoldaşlarım, zafer! Görev bizi çağırıyor! Müttefiklerimiz bu tuhaf yarığın ardında bizi bekliyor, zaman kaybetmeyelim!" {n}Elinde ilginç bir zeno cihazı tutuyor. Komiser, cihazı yarığa doğru çevirip birkaç düğmeye basıyor, karmaşık entropik enerjiler sakinleşip sabit bir portal oluşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's resolve is palpable.{/n} "Victory, comrades! Duty beckons! Our allies are waiting on the other side of this strange rift, so let us not waste time!" {n}He is holding a strange xenodevice. The Commissar points it at the rift, presses a few buttons, and the roiling entropic energies die down, forming a stable portal.{/n}
